entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:45 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 8:55 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. 40 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain over western sections overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
